channel.title: [24/7] The One Server to Rule Them All [SMP][Towny][mcMMO][PVP][1.4.4]
channel.description:
Here is a link to our current "main thread" on the official MC forums: [url=http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/1528015-247-the-one-server-to-rule-them-all-smptownymcmmopvp1000-registered-membersno-griefing/]http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/1528015-247-the-one-server-to-rule-them-all-smptownymcmmopvp1000-registered-membersno-griefing/[/url]
Please visit the URL for the complete list of features that our server offers, Im posting this here in an attempt to get our server out there more and get some new players.
Although the Original Post on the thread probably says 1.3, we're currently running 1.4.4 and we have a friendly and helpful community as well professional admins/mods who know what they are doing and will be glad to help you with any problems your having.
